network.description: structure to hold persistent network data

global.description: structure to hold global settings for parameters in the network

unit_convention.description: units used for physical network parameters

bus_ref.description: UID of reference bus of the electrical network

items.description: geographical subset of the electrical network with common Automatic Generation Control (AGC) and responsible for its Area Control Error (ACE)

status.description: binary indicator of whether area should be included or omitted (if omitted all elements within area should be omitted); 1=>included, 0=>omitted

source_uid.description: additional area parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: geographical subset of the electrical network commonly associated with market purposes (e.g., define sub-markets within a large interconnected system, defining different areas for reserve products, etc.)

status.description: binary indicator of whether zone should be included or omitted (if omitted all elements within zone should be omitted); 1=>included, 0=>omitted

source_uid.description: additional zone parameters currently not supported by CTM

type.description: bus type for power flow calculations (PV, PQ, or slack)

area.description: uid for area to which bus belongs to

zone.description: uid for zone to which bus belongs to

source_uid.description: additional bus parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: structure to hold load (consumer) data using ZIP model

bus.description: uid of bus to which load is connected to

pd_i.description: constant current active power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu

qd_i.description: constant current reactive power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu

pd_y.description: constant impedance active power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu

qd_y.description: constant impedance reactive power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu

source_uid.description: additional bus parameters currently not supported by CTM

bus.description: uid of bus to which shunt is connected to

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of shunt (nameplate capacity)

num_steps_ub.description: upper bound for number of energized steps of shunt section (lower bound is always 0)

gs.description: active power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu, per step of each shunt section

bs.description: reactive power demand at v_bus = 1.0 pu, per step of each shunt section

source_uid.description: additional shunt parameters currently not supported by CTM

bus.description: uid of bus to which generator is connected to

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of generator (nameplate capacity)

vm_setpoint.description: target voltage magnitude of the bus that this generator connects to

pg_lb.description: lower bound of active power injection (rectangular operating zone)

pg_ub.description: upper bound of active power injection (rectangular operating zone)

qg_lb.description: lower bound of reactive power injection (rectangular operating zone)

qg_ub.description: upper bound of reactive power injection (rectangular operating zone)

primary_source_subtype.description: subtype of primary energy source; thermal classification taken from https://www.eia.gov/survey/form/eia_923/instructions.pdf

cost_pg_model.description: type of generation cost model (i.e., function translating power/energy to money); POLYNOMIAL => cost_pg_parameters is an array with n+1 coefficients <a_i> for f(x) = a_0 + a_1 x^1 + ... + a_n x^n; PIECEWISE_LINEAR => cost_pg_parameters is a series of values <x_i, f_i> and cost (f) should be interpolated linearly in between points; MARGINAL_COST => cost_pg_parameters is a series of values <b_i, m_i>, where m_i is a marginal cost ($/MWh or $/(pu*h)) and b_i is the amoung of power (MWh or pu*h) sold at marginal cost m_i

cost_pg_parameters.description: parameters of generation cost function, can be time dependent

startup_cost_hot.description: [$] cost of starting the unit after being off <= startup_time_hot hours

startup_cost_warm.description: [$] cost of starting the unit after being off > startup_time_hot hours, but <= startup_time_warm hours

startup_cost_cold.description: [$] cost of starting the unit after being off > startup_time_warm hours

shutdown_cost.description: [$] cost of shutting down the unit

startup_time_hot.description: [h] maximum time the unit can be off before a hot startup

startup_time_warm.description: [h] maximum time the unit can be off before a warm startup

in_service_time_ub.description: [h] maximum time the unit can be in service (commitment == 1)

in_service_time_lb.description: [h] minimim time the unit can be in service (a.k.a., minimum up time)

down_time_lb.description: [h] minimim time the unit can be out of service (a.k.a., minimum down time)

pg_delta_ub.description: [MW/h or pu/h] maximum active power increase per hour

pg_delta_lb.description: [MW/h or pu/h] maximum active power decrease per hour

service_required.description: whether generator must be in service (e.g., nuclear power plant) or out of service (e.g., generator during maintenance or after an outage); 0 => no requirement, 1 => fixed in service, 2 => fixed out of service

source_uid.description: additional gen parameters currently not supported by CTM

bus.description: uid of bus to which generator is connected to

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of storage (nameplate capacity)

ps_ex.description: converter standby active power exogenous draw

qs_ex.description: converter standby reactive power exogenous draw

energy_ub.description: [MWh or pu*h] maximum state of charge

charge_ub.description: [MW or pu] maximum rate of charge

discharge_ub.description: [MW or pu] maximum rate of discharge

sm_ub.description: [MVA or pu] converter apparent power rating

cm_ub.description: [kA or pu] converter current output rating

qs_lb.description: [MVAr or pu] minumum reactive power injection

qs_ub.description: [MVAr or pu] maximum reactive power injection

ps_delta_ub.description: [MW/h or pu/h] maximum active power increase per hour

ps_delta_lb.description: [MW/h or pu/h] maximum active power decrease per hour

source_uid.description: additional storage parameters currently not supported by CTM

bus_fr.description: uid of bus at the from terminal of switch

bus_to.description: uid of bus at the to terminal of switch

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of switch (nameplate capacity)

sm_ub.description: [MVA or pu] apparent power flow limit

source_uid.description: additional switch parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: structure to hold ac line data using concentrated (6-parameter circuit) PI model

bus_fr.description: uid of bus at the from terminal of ac line

bus_to.description: uid of bus at the to terminal of ac line

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of ac line

r.description: [Ohm or pu] series resistance of line

x.description: [Ohm or pu] series impedance of line

g_fr.description: [S or pu] shunt conductance of line at from terminal

b_fr.description: [S or pu] shunt susceptance of line at from terminal

g_to.description: [S or pu] shunt conductance of line at to terminal

b_to.description: [S or pu] shunt susceptance of line at to terminal

sm_ub_a.description: [MVA or pu] persistent apparent power rating

source_uid.description: additional ac line parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: structure to hold 2-winding transformer and phase shifter data using simplified (4-parameter circuit) model

bus_fr.description: uid of bus at the from terminal of transformer

bus_to.description: uid of bus at the to terminal of transformer

r.description: [Ohm or pu] series resistance of line

x.description: [Ohm or pu] series impedance of line

g.description: [S or pu] shunt conductance of transformer at from terminal (magnetizing branch)

b.description: [S or pu] shunt susceptance of transformer at from terminal (magnetizing branch)

tm_lb.description: [-] minimum tap ratio (1.0 correspond to nominal ratio, inner_vm_from = vm_from * tap_value)

tm_ub.description: [-] maximum tap ratio (1.0 correspond to nominal ratio, inner_vm_from = vm_from * tap_value)

tm_steps.description: number of discrete steps between tm_lb and tm_ub (including limit values)

ta_lb.description: [-] minimum angle phase shift (angle difference = va_from - va_to - angle_shift)

ta_ub.description: [-] maximum angle phase shift (angle difference = va_from - va_to - angle_shift)

ta_steps.description: number of discrete steps between ta_lb and ta_ub (including limit values)

sm_ub_a.description: [MVA or pu] persistent apparent power rating, referred to from side

sm_ub_b.description: [MVA or pu] 4-hour apparent power rating, referred to from side

sm_ub_c.description: [MVA or pu] 15-minute apparent power rating, referred to from side

cm_ub_a.description: [kA or pu] persistent current rating, referred to from side

cm_ub_b.description: [kA or pu] 4-hour current rating, referred to from side

cm_ub_c.description: [kA or pu] 15-minute current rating, referred to from side

source_uid.description: additional transformer parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: structure to hold point-to-point hvdc line data

bus_fr.description: uid of bus at the from terminal of hvdc line

bus_to.description: uid of bus at the to terminal of hvdc line

nominal_mva.description: [MVA] nominal apparent power of hvdc line

base_kv_dc.description: [kV] base voltage at the dc side

vm_dc_lb.description: [kV or pu] minimum voltage at the dc side

vm_dc_ub.description: [kV or pu] maximum voltage at the dc side

pdc_fr_lb.description: [MW or pu] minimum active power entering hvdc line at from bus

qdc_fr_lb.description: [MVAr or pu] minimum reactive power entering hvdc line at from bus

pdc_fr_ub.description: [MW or pu] maximum active power entering hvdc line at from bus

qdc_fr_ub.description: [MVAr or pu] maximum reactive power entering hvdc line at from bus

pdc_to_lb.description: [MW or pu] minimum active power entering hvdc line at to bus

qdc_to_lb.description: [MVAr or pu] minimum reactive power entering hvdc line at to bus

pdc_to_ub.description: [MW or pu] maximum active power entering hvdc line at to bus

qdc_to_ub.description: [MW or pu] maximum active power entering hvdc line at to bus

r.description: [Ohm or pu] dc line resistance (if in pu, base voltage corresponds to base_kv_dc)

loss_b.description: [kV or pu] loss proportional to current magnitude (if in pu, base voltage corresponds to base_kv_dc)

loss_c.description: [Ohm or pu] loss proportional to current magnitude squared (if in pu, base voltage corresponds to base_kv_dc)

sm_ub.description: [MVA or pu] ac persistent apparent power rating

cm_ub_fr.description: [kA or pu] ac persistent current rating, from terminal (if in pu, use from bus base_kv)
[kA or pu] ac persistent current rating, to terminal (if in pu, use to bus base_kv)

phi_lb.description: [degrees] only meaningful if technology == LCC; firing angle minimum

phi_ub.description: [degrees] only meaningful if technology == LCC; firing angle maximum

source_uid.description: additional hvdc point-to-point parameters currently not supported by CTM

items.description: structure to hold reserve product and requirement data

participants.description: uid of generators contributing to this reserve

pg_up.description: [MW or pu] upward active power required by this reserve

pg_down.description: [MW or pu] downward active power required by this reserve

source_uid.description: additional reserve parameters currently not supported by CTM

binary.description: binary indicator of whether component should be included or omitted; 1=>included, 0=>omitted

xy_pairs.description: pairs of data points saved as two vectors (of the same length)
